name: RoadBlocked
description:
The first game that I've actually seen through to completion. I'm no expert  in creating games but occasionally I get the urge to try some things out. 

In roadblocked I just wanted to try and make a simple game (think of early 2000s flash games) that looked slightly more rounded, here is the result. We have a car, loads of Road blocks. All you need to do is get past them using WASD keys.
